title: The Citizens' Parliament
shortDescription: A citizen's parliament about the ecological emergency
description: Our new government wants more citizen participation in politics and at the same time ambitious environmental policy? The Citizens' Parliament has a proposition ready! 101 randomly selected citizens, representative of the Belgian population, who, with support of scientists and experts, think about the greatest challenge of our time.
faqSubtitle: A citizens’ parliament? Has that ever worked? And who’s going to pay for that? You’ll probably have lots of questions. We hope to answer them all here.

openingMessage: Party politics as usual has not been able to take the necessary measures to prevent ecological disasters such as climate change, biodiversity and biomass loss, pollution or soil erosion. Let's join many other countries and organize a national citizens' assembly to draft issues to these complex solutions!
